page.title: 14Communications
page.content: Inhabitants living in this block enjoy greater contact with the 'outside world'than 30 years ago. A direct airlink to Tingwall (mainland Shetland) has been achieved by Loganair, who also cater for hospital emergency flights. The Ro-Ro inter-island ferries similarily link Unst to the mainland (via Yell).A reduced timetable is operated in winter, and there are no regular late night ferries. A recent proposal to extend the ferry service has been met by strong disapproval locally, as these late ferries were offered as an alternative solution to building a Sports Centre in Unst. The impractibility of using the Lerwick (clickamin Centre) regularly is evident: travelling time from Unst for the round trip being almost 6 hours.
